'''''Speedrun''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain the "Standby Mode" ending in {{Quest|A Decision (Hangout Event)}}.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the video game practice of {{w|speedrunning}}: completing a game as quickly as possible. This is very likely a meta joke pointing out the fact that this ending of the Hangout is extremely fast to reach in comparison to the others.
